items.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Oracle, Figma, Trilogy Metals, Ford and more
items.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

items.title: Ray Dalio says today is like the early 1970s and investors should hold more gold than usual
items.description: "Gold is the only asset that somebody can hold and you don't have to depend on somebody else to pay you money for," Dalio said.

items.title: NYSE-owner Intercontinental Exchange rises after it takes $2 billion stake in Polymarket
items.description: Intercontinental Exchange rose more than 3% in the premarket after the company announced it took a $2 billion stake in prediction markets platform Pol...

items.title: World Bank raises China growth forecast to 4.8% despite U.S. trade tensions
items.description: The World Bank now projects 4.8% growth for China, up from 4.0% predicted earlier this year.
